markdownRemark.html:
Be deliberate with time by setting clear expectations of time & outcomes prior to beginning. This is especially important when busy in order to avoid waste of time.

Blocks of time should be invested to make future better. Thereâ€™s no getting time back; it can and should be used wisely to make future better.

frontmatter.title: Be deliberate with time by planning - especially when busy
